alert.note: Alert for Logan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:11PM MDT until July 21 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Washington County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 711 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Merino, or 13 miles southwest of Sterling, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Merino around 715 PM MDT. Prewitt Reservoir and Atwood around 720 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
